entry.title: RT nick.eth: ENS is looking for DevRel talent. Hit me up!
entry.summary: RT nick.eth ENS is looking for DevRel talent. Hit me up! nader dabit (🧱, 🚀) | sha.eth | nader.sol: How to get hired in DevRel in web3 1. Find a protocol / team in need of DevRel 2. Learn tech then create a good example codebase with high quality learning material around it - workshop, tutorial, video 3. Apply for a grant, get paid for your work regardless 4. Share it 5. Apply

entry.title: RT Tableland: We love the mission of @developer_dao and want to give @tableland__ creators a chance to join. Friday at 10:00 AM PST, we'll be giving a...
entry.summary: RT Tableland We love the mission of @developer_dao and want to give @tableland__ creators a chance to join. Friday at 10:00 AM PST, we'll be giving away a free @developer_dao membership at our bi-weekly @tableland__ workshop. Learn, build, and then join D_D to learn and build some more! 1/2

entry.title: RT BluePanda ( 💻, 🚀 ): Guys I had a really fun call today with @developer_dao, it was for 1 hour but we actually stayed for 2. TL;DR @grow_love ...
entry.summary: RT BluePanda ( 💻, 🚀 ) Guys I had a really fun call today with @developer_dao, it was for 1 hour but we actually stayed for 2. TL;DR @grow_love @myz12371 @0xhmz (and everyone else) you are amazing! Can’t wait to talk again on Thursday Call Guys Join D_D they, at least I have fun 😋

entry.title: RT Orlundo Hubbard | orlundo.eth: Written with love ♥️
entry.summary: RT Orlundo Hubbard | orlundo.eth Written with love ♥️ Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): 💫 My first week as a software engineer by @developer_dao member @OrlundoH Becoming an engineer is a dream come true of mine and I’m excited to share this journey with more people, which is why I’ve chosen to document it. 💥 https://mirror.xyz/orlundo.eth/QoEMC29X5eASdftOwXY8UYTv9awnSqSrqhqMGRNqF6Y

entry.title: RT david phelps (🐮,🐮)(🃏,🃏): did not hear, see, or think about a single animal jpeg for one week, but did hear, see, and think exclusively ...
entry.summary: RT david phelps (🐮,🐮)(🃏,🃏) did not hear, see, or think about a single animal jpeg for one week, but did hear, see, and think exclusively about future-bending projects like @CelestiaOrg @fuellabs_ @ankr @nomadxyz_ @guildxyz @PolymerDAO, and this is why devconnect is by far the best conference i've been to

(👀 @developer_dao) DM me if you want to give it a spin!
